Best gaming accessories on Amazon

Here are some of the best gaming accessories such as mouse, keyboard, SSDs, and others available on Amazon India.

By
Siddharth Suvarna
-
Published On: December 6, 2022 | Last Updated: December 19, 2022

If you’re looking to build a gaming computer or want to pick gaming accessories for your laptop, then we’ve made things easier for you with this list. We’ve listed down the best gaming accessories on a budget for you. These include products such as a high-refresh rate display, gaming mouse, keyboard, SSD storage for fast launch, and gamepads. Serious gamers will definitely enjoy playing their games on a high-refresh rate display. Products such as laser gaming mouse, RGB keyboard, and SSD storage also make gaming better. If you don’t like using the keyboard to play your games, then you may want to go for a gamepad. Let’s take a look at some of the best gaming accessories that you can buy on Amazon India.

Table of Contents

  • Things to consider when buying a gaming accessory
  • Best gaming accessories to buy on Amazon India
    • 1. Acer XZ306CX Monitor
    • 2. Ant Esports KM500W
    • 3. Microsoft Xbox Series X/S Wireless Controller
    • 4. Crucial BX500 240GB
    • 5. WD_BLACK SN850X NVMe SSD Gaming Storage
    • 6. Nitho Drive Pro One Gaming Racing Wheel
    • 7. Razer Baracuda X 
  • Other accessories to consider
  • Zebronics Zeb-Transformer-k USB Gaming Keyboard
  • Redgear MP35 Control-Type Gaming Mousepad
  • Logitech G213
  • LOKO Mobile Phone Gamepad Triggers
  • Logitech G 402 Hyperion Fury

Things to consider when buying a gaming accessory

Compatibility: Before you go ahead and buy any gaming accessory, ensure that it works with your system of choice. Many accessories may not work with select platforms. Even PC gamers will have to keep this in mind as some newer accessories may not work with older hardware. 

Style: Taste is always subjective. As such, just because someone else likes something doesn’t necessarily mean that you should like it too. The same goes for the ‘gamer aesthetic’. Some may like RGB lighting while others might prefer a more subdued setup. Pick one that you like and go with that. 

Space: Some of these accessories will take up space on your desk. So ensure that you have enough space on your desk to accommodate these items. Of course, you may also have to keep cable management in mind with some of these accessories to ensure that your setup looks neat and tidy. 

Best gaming accessories to buy on Amazon India

1. Acer XZ306CX Monitor

Feature packed
Acer XZ306CX 29.5 Inch (74.93 Cm) Ultrawide 21:9 1500R Curve 2560 X 1080 Pixels LCD Monitor with LED Backlight I 1 MS VRB I 200 Hz I HDR 400 I DCI-P3 93% I AMD Free Sync I 2XHDMI 1XDP I White
₹ 21990
₹ 35000 (38% off)
Buy on Amazon

With its curved ergonomics, this 1500R Acer XZ306CX curved gaming monitor will provide you with an immersive gaming experience. It has a 200Hz refresh rate and 1ms VRB for smooth game rendering. It has a 29.5-inch FHD display size to offer expansive visuals. Its compatibility with the VESA Display HDR 400 enables it to render brighter images with natural blacks for realistic imagery. Further, the monitor covers 93 per cent DCI-P3 wide colour gamut and has 6-axis colour adjustments to help with colour accuracy. This means the monitor is an excellent choice for colour-sensitive tasks such as photo and video editing as well. The monitor also has two 2W stereo speakers for booming sound. It also has HDMI 1.4 and HDMI 2.0 ports, as well as DP ports for flexible connectivity options. The monitor also helps you achieve an ergonomic position as it can tilt, swivel, and adjust the height. The Acer XZ306CX Monitor is further equipped with Acer VisionCare technology to protect your eyes. The monitor also has black boost technology to help you clearly see in a dark video game environment.

2. Ant Esports KM500W

Value for money
Ant Esports KM500W Gaming Backlit Keyboard and Mouse Combo, LED Wired Gaming Keyboard, Ergonomic & Wrist Rest Keyboard, Programmable Gaming Mouse for PC/Laptop/Mac- World of Warships Edition
₹ 1049
₹ 1999 (48% off)
Buy on Amazon

The gaming keyboard features rainbow LED backlight that adds extra appeal in the dark. Compared to keys on the regular keyboard, the keys on this one will last you twice the duration, reaching up to 50 million clicks. You can adjust DPI of the bundled gaming mouse between 800 to 3200 dpi to meet different needs for games. The keyboard is slip-resistant which allows it to handle minor water or coffee splashes without any damage caused. The keyboard supports all popular platforms like Windows and MacOS. For the comfort of gamers, the keyboard has built-in palm rest to aid their need for long gaming and typing session.

3. Microsoft Xbox Series X/S Wireless Controller

Popular
Microsoft Xbox Series X/S Wireless Controller Carbon Black
₹ 5049
₹ 5990 (16% off)
Buy on Amazon

The standard Microsoft Xbox Series X/S Wireless Controller now comes with an improved design and several notable controller improvements over the old model. The controller now features a dedicated share button to let you easily share screenshots and game clips to social media. It can easily pair and easily switch between Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows 10 PCs, and Android and iOS devices. The Xbox controller also gets a hybrid D-pad, and textured grip on the triggers, bumpers, and back-case to offer a comfortable grip so you play for long hours without fatigue. The controller also lets you map buttons for a personalized navigation experience. It has a 3.5mm headphone jack that lets you connect any headset. The controller offers Bluetooth connectivity and has a USB-C port that lets you connect rechargeable batteries for longer playtimes – a vital feature, especially considering the Xbox wireless controller offers support for standard AA batteries.

4. Crucial BX500 240GB

User recommended
Crucial BX500 240GB 3D NAND SATA 6.35 cm (2.5-inch) SSD (CT240BX500SSD1)
₹ 1311
₹ 2400 (46% off)
Buy on Amazon

Crucial has budget SSDs in the market and the BX500 is a reliable hardware that enhances the overall performance of the gaming machine. You get this model with 240GB storage that can go inside a desktop or laptop. The 2.5-inch drive supports SATA interface for speeds up to 6GB/sec which translates into read and write speeds of 540MB/sec and 540MB/sec, respectively. It offers 300 percent faster than a hard disk, but still keeps the power bill down. SSD means the system boot up time and app performance also improve dramatically.

5. WD_BLACK SN850X NVMe SSD Gaming Storage

User recommended
WD_Black SN850X NVMe SSD Gaming Storage, 1TB
₹ 9033
₹ 16600 (46% off)
Buy on Amazon

If you are building a new gaming PC, you have to check out the WD Black gaming storage SSD. The SSD uses the PCIe Gen 4 technology to achieve speeds up to 7,300MB/s and near-instant response times. Moreover, the lower response times should help with smoother game rendering as well. This particular variant has a total storage capacity of 1TB so you can store most of your favorite games. The SSD is also compatible with Game Mode 2.0, which helps the PC and SSD work in tandem to extract the full potential of the PCIe Gen 4 interface. The company says the SSD doesn’t bottleneck even when simultaneously playing, streaming, and recording the games. Further, you can attach a separate heatsink to get sustained read/write performance out of the WD Black gaming storage SSD, even after long hours of use. 

6. Nitho Drive Pro One Gaming Racing Wheel

Feature packed
NiTHO Drive PRO One Gaming Racing Wheel with Separate Shifter and Pedals, Zero Dead Zone Steering Wheel with 28 Action Buttons, Compatible with PC/PS4/PS3/Xbox One/Xbox Series X|S/Nintendo Switch
₹ 0
Buy on Amazon

Nitho Drive Pro-One Gaming Racing Wheel is for those who like to experience greater immersion while playing racing games on consoles. It is also compatible with Windows PCs as well. The 10-inch racing wheel simulates realistic vibrations effects while racing through tracks. It has a wide set of controls and features 270-degree angle lock-to-lock steering wheel movement. Further, it gets Zero Dead Zone for PS4 and most Xbox consoles and has a D-input for PCs. The wheel features 28 actions buttons and an analog stick for greater control and navigation experience. And all the controllers are ergonomically placed so that your fingers can easily reach them for added comfort while navigating. Further, it also gets adaptable and extensible clamp and bolt points to let you can attach the wheel to any desk. Further, it also gets removable suction cups to make it easy to clean the controller. Lastly, you can attach separate floor pedals and sequential gear shifters for an even more immersive experience while racing.

7. Razer Baracuda X 

Value for money
Razer Barracuda X - Wireless Multi-Platform Wired Gaming and Mobile On Ear Headset - Mercury White - RZ04-03800200-R3M1
₹ 0
Buy on Amazon

Razer Baracuda X is a well-rounded headset that is compatible with a wide range of gaming platforms — including PCs, consoles, and mobile devices. It comes with Razer Smart Switch Dual Wireless mode that works over Bluetooth and a 2.4GHz connection. This means you can take calls from the connected Bluetooth device and switch to the game audio when the call ends. The headset has a comfortable ergonomic design so you can keep playing games for long hours without any discomfort. This is achieved through the Flowkit memory foams on the earcups. Moreover, the earcup’s swiveling and pivoting design ensures you can adjust the headset according to your needs. The headphone use Razer Triforce 40mm large drivers to offer immersive highs, mids, and lows. The headphone also gets a detachable mic, which also has a 360-degree voice pick and noise cancelling abilities for a clear voice chatting experience. It also has controls on the earcup that let you play/pause and skip tracks. With a triple press, you can switch between Razer HyperSpeed Wireless and Bluetooth mode as well. Razer Baracuda X offers up to 50 hours of battery life on a single charge.
